title: Unbeatable Price in Memphis!! Weekly Special!!!
posting_body: Under new management- Economy Hotel Memphis, we specialize in helping individuals who are struggling with finding affordable accommodation.
No deposit & no credit check required!
Weekly fee is $200/ (*taxes and fees not included).
It includes ALL utilities and services!
(heat, gas, cable, electric, parking etc.) CALL US AND START SAVING YOUR MONEY TODAY!
THE ECONOMY HOTEL OPERATES AS A HOTEL AND NOT AN APARTMENT COMPLEX.
THIS ADD IS INTENDED FOR MARKETING PURPOSES OF THE ECONOMY HOTEL
